trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around November 14th 2007
Summary: Two appeared over Newbridge rd. and house at around 2:15AM, one other witness, unidentified.
divs: sighting detailsi had been speaking on the phone with my girlfriend and afterwards i decided to go outside for a cigarette. i love going in my backyard at night because it seems as though i have a perfect view of the stars. i lit up and looked up as i usually do; the stars were brilliant last night as well. i stared above when i noticed an object, i kept my eye on it because i am, honestly, always looking for something out of the ordinary. i believed it was a plane for the first, perhaps, 7-8 seconds i had my eye on it until it dropped feverishly and then took off towards the direction it came from with unearthly speed. i was startled but it was late and believed i may have just been seeing things until i looked back up at the stars and believed that i saw stars moving. this was the second object i viewed. as i watched this object, which was not as illuminated as the other, the other came back into my eyesight. i watched it as it sped with alarming speed and dropped to a very dangerous level and flowed over towards my house. it almost glided with such ease, there was no sound, and the movements were so fluid. it almost seemed like this object was on a reconaissance mission. it had stopped on a dime right around where i was standing, only for a second or two, and then continued moving. the color emitted from this object was amazing. it was almost like the entire object was on fire, that's what the color resembled, and there was a motion to it... it seemed as though it were spinning like a top, that's my best description. at this time i became extremely alarmed, i did have my phone on me which is adapted with a camera and tried snapping a few photos but the delay really screwed me and i wound up with nothing of value. i walked into the front yard, hoenstly because i was scared. there was a pickup stopped infront of my house and i went over to it. i asked the guy driving if he saw what i did and he said yes. he then pointed out the other object, the blue one, a few hundred yards away. i started walking back to my house because i just had an uneasy feeling and the man in the pick up told me not to scream or draw any attention to myself, which i though to myself as "yea obviously guy" but i just said okay. i looked up as i walked back to the overhang of my garage and took a closer look at the blue object that was just kind of hanging in space. what i saw i believed to be the front of the craft, i dont know why but at the time thats what i thought. it was almost like looking at a dinner plate but flipped on its side and looking at it head on. there were three blue lights, top, middle, and bottom. the middle light was not as bright as the other two. it began moving and i watched it ascend into the night sky until it basically disappeared. there was no sight of either of the crafts again and i was feeling a little nervous\anxious and made my way back into the comfort of my home. i know it was late at night, or early morning which ever you prefer but i'd love to know if anyone else had seen the same thing i had and had any footage or photos of the event. thanks.
